codeAndMeasure.title: Responsability, Trust, Transparency, Competance, client satisfaction
codeAndMeasure.description: At Junctioner Construction Engineering, we have built our values on the pillars of the construction industry
codeAndMeasure.teamDesc: The expert team brings a wealth of knowledge and creativity to every project

whoWeAre.title: Our Values
whoWeAre.ds: We have built our values on the pillars of the construction industry—an industry characterized by risk, multiple stakeholders, huge investments, and our clients' intense focus on their projects. These values includ
whoWeAre.ds_1: These values guide our actions, decisions, and relationships, enabling us to successfully navigate the challenges of the construction industry and provide exceptional service to our customers.
whoWeAre.team_des: We take responsibility for our actions and decisions, ensuring that we fulfill our obligations and deliver results that meet the highest standards.
whoWeAre.amb_des: We believe in building strong relationships based on trust with our clients, partners, and team members. Trust is the foundation of successful collaborations and long-term partnerships.
whoWeAre.dream_des: We take pride in the expertise and skills of our team. Through continuous learning and professional development, we ensure that we remain at the forefront of industry knowledge and deliver exceptional solutions.
whoWeAre.bt_des: We embrace transparency in all aspects of our work. We communicate openly and honestly, providing clear information and perspectives to our customers and stakeholders.
whoWeAre.cam_des: Our ultimate goal is customer satisfaction. We prioritize our customers' needs, preferences, and objectives, constantly striving to exceed their expectations and deliver successful results.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.titleOne: New Food Agro Industry Company (sNFAI) Industry
projects.contentOne: On behalf of the New Food Agro Industry (sNFAI) Company, we are managing and supervising the construction project of an agro-food industry in the locality of Missole 1, Dibamba. This project started on a surface area of 3 hectares and has expanded to cover 10 hectares.
projects.contentTwo: Construction of a university residence in the Commune of Mfou, consisting of 21 rooms (7 rooms per floor) with toilets and a kitchen area.
projects.contentThree: Construction of a university residence in the Commune of Eyang, near Saint John Catholic University. Specifications: 21 rooms (7 rooms per floor with toilets and a kitchen area), shops on the ground floor.
projects.contentFour: A construction project is underway for a 300 m² rental building. The ground floor will include three 2-room apartments (T2) and two 1-room apartments (T1). The two upper floors (1st and 2nd floors) will each have six 1-room apartments (T1) and two modern rooms, bringing the total to twenty-four rental units once the building is completed.
projects.contentFive: This renovation project aims to create high-standard furnished apartments. The plan includes transforming the space to accommodate a studio, a one-bedroom apartment, and a two-bedroom apartment, all designed with top-quality finishes and equipment for a premium rental offer.
projects.contentSix: This renovation project aims to create high-standard furnished apartments. The plan includes transforming the space to accommodate a studio, a one-bedroom apartment, and a two-bedroom apartment, all designed with top-quality finishes and equipment for a premium rental offer.
projects.titleSeven: New UBC Bank Branch, Biyem-Assi Agency
projects.contentSeven: Renovation works and construction of the Union Bank of Cameroon premises, Biyem-Assi branch. Lot 3: false ceiling, floor and wall coverings, and alucobond façade.

projectPage.title: How we work
projectPage.description: Below is a chart that shows how we organise our projects from start to finish.
projectPage.d2: In charge of architectural design and coordination with other disciplines.
projectPage.d3: Responsible for the design and implementation of structures and construction systems.
projectPage.d4: Manages documentation and ensures consistency of information throughout the project.
projectPage.d5: Oversees planning and execution of on-site works.
projectPage.d6: Conducts topographic surveys and measurements to support design and construction.
projectPage.d7: Ensures overall project quality by supervising various aspects and ensuring compliance with standards.
projectPage.d8: Handles the design and installation of the project's electrical systems.
projectPage.d9: Supervises work related to masonry and use of construction materials.
projectPage.d10: In charge of the design and installation of plumbing systems.
projectPage.d11: Oversees the design and execution of carpentry and finishing elements.
projectPage.d12: Supervises the design and installation of metal structures.
projectPage.dO2: Design and Construction in Yaoundé City

servicePage.title: Our Services
servicePage.d1: We offer complete project management, including planning, organization, and control of all construction phases. Our team ensures adherence to deadlines, budget, and quality, while coordinating the various stakeholders.
servicePage.d2: We create architectural designs tailored to our clients' specific needs. Our team works on varied projects, ranging from residential buildings to public infrastructure, guaranteeing both functionality and aesthetics.
servicePage.d3: Our designers create harmonious and practical interior and exterior spaces. We focus on space optimization, material selection, and color harmony to offer pleasant and welcoming environments.
servicePage.d4: We integrate home automation technologies into our projects, allowing for intelligent control of security, lighting, heating systems, and other functionalities. This enhances comfort and energy efficiency in homes.
servicePage.d5: Our earthwork services include leveling and preparing the ground for construction. We use modern equipment to ensure a solid foundation for all types of structures.
servicePage.d6: We conduct precise topographic surveys to aid in project planning and execution. Our services include field surveying, geospatial analysis, and the production of detailed maps.
servicePage.d7: We offer plumbing, carpentry, and locksmithing work to ensure the functionality and security of buildings. Our qualified craftsmen guarantee installations compliant with quality standards.
servicePage.d8: We are committed to research and development to improve our practices and introduce innovative solutions in the construction sector. This includes the adoption of new materials and construction techniques.
servicePage.d9: We offer installation and maintenance services for electrical and air conditioning systems, ensuring they are efficient and comply with current regulations.
servicePage.d10: We manage the import and export of construction materials and equipment, as well as other related services. This allows us to meet various needs while ensuring product quality.
servicePage.contactTitle: What can we do for you?

weArePage.title: We Are the Builders Who Make Everything Possible
weArePage.d1: A visionary with a deep sense of humanity, Kacdeu Baudoin embodies the values of Junctioner Construction Engineering. With a strong will to help the team grow, he cares about everyone’s well-being, creating an environment conducive to professional fulfillment.
weArePage.p2: Civil Design Engineer, Head of Infrastructure
weArePage.d2: A talented design engineer, Eng. Kameni Lionel is known for his intelligence and leadership. Precise and resourceful, he aims for excellence in all his projects, demonstrating outstanding managerial and coordination skills.
weArePage.p3: Project Manager, Architect, Head of Architecture Department
weArePage.d3: Dynamic and committed to the collective mission, Ngalandeu Kwemo Adrien ensures every component of his projects functions smoothly. His ability to manage teams efficiently makes him a key asset for Junctioner Construction Engineering.
weArePage.p4: Project Manager, Design Architect, Head of Quality & Finishing Department
weArePage.d4: DZOUDJA Nana Sandra embodies excellence with an eye for detail and a passion for interior architecture. Dynamic and proactive, she maintains a 360-degree vision over her projects. Professional and disciplined, her strengths include practical sense, exceptional talent, and remarkable creativity.
weArePage.p5: Civil Design Engineer, Project Manager, Head of Special Structures
weArePage.d5: Eng. Andele Onana Christopher is a rigorous and serious leader, always striving for quality. For him, management is a way of life, and he works to inspire his team to achieve outstanding results.
weArePage.d6: Dynamic and proactive, Ambama Clémence ensures that all elements are in place to meet the company’s goals. She is always ready to support her director and contribute to the team’s success.
weArePage.d7: Humble and demanding, Idene Sinclaire is always eager to learn and deliver concrete results. Her determination and pursuit of excellence make her a valuable architect within Junctioner Construction Engineering.
weArePage.d8: Diligent and creative, Eng. Nganguem Joyce stands out for his rigor and ability to handle complex situations. Always respectful and eager to learn, he is a pillar of the team, bringing innovative solutions to every project.
weArePage.d9: Versatile and dynamic, Jeffry DJOUMBI NGANKAM is diligent in his work and dedicated to his tasks. His creativity and commitment make him a valuable member of the Junctioner Construction Engineering team.
